elements.title: Understand Context
elements.subtitle: Gather background information
elements.info:
Engage with stakeholders and review the existing documentation to fully understand the current situation. Capture any constraints, assumptions, and desired outcomes.

  • Interview subject matter experts
  • Review historical reports
  • List constraints and opportunities

elements.title: Define Goal
elements.subtitle: Clarify the target state
elements.info: Translate stakeholder needs into a clear, measurable goal. Ensure everyone agrees on what success looks like.

elements.title: Map Process
elements.subtitle: Visualise the workflow
elements.info: Create a step-by-step view of the current process. Identify inputs, outputs, decision points, and responsible roles.

elements.title: Identify Gaps
elements.subtitle: Spot weaknesses and risks
elements.info: Compare the current process with the desired outcome to find inefficiencies, bottlenecks, or missing capabilities.

elements.title: Prioritise Actions
elements.subtitle: Rank improvements
elements.info: Evaluate the impact, effort, and urgency of each identified gap. Agree on the order in which actions should be taken.

elements.title: Design Solutions
elements.subtitle: Craft actionable changes
elements.info: Co-create detailed solution options with the implementation team. Document requirements, dependencies, and expected benefits.

elements.title: Plan Implementation
elements.subtitle: Prepare delivery roadmap
elements.info: Break down the selected solution into tasks, allocate owners, and establish a realistic timeline with milestones.

elements.title: Execute Changes
elements.subtitle: Roll out improvements
elements.info: Coordinate the delivery team to implement the plan. Track progress, remove blockers, and manage risks.

elements.title: Measure Results
elements.subtitle: Evaluate outcomes
elements.info: Assess the impact of the implemented changes using predefined metrics. Capture lessons learned to inform future initiatives.

elements.title: Continuous Communication
elements.subtitle: Enable feedback loops
elements.info:
Suhtlus happens throughout the entire initiative. Share updates, collect feedback, and ensure transparency between every pair of steps.

Drop this card onto the arrows to emphasise when communication is required. You can apply it to multiple arrows.
